about_the_game:
Founding A Sect

You can create your own martial arts sect or play as one of the unique sects that already exist in the game.

The Kunlun sect that is dedicated to cultivation? The Five Poisons Sect that is good at poison skills?

Jinling Gate, a wealthy family operating in Jiangnan? Or is it the Yanyun faction that is proficient in Qimen Dunjia?

Each sect has its own unique characteristics, and it has its own way of survival in this Jianghu.

Create your own sect characteristics, survive and grow in the ever-changing rivers and lakes.

Cultivating Disciples

Under the famous family, there are indispensable disciples who pay, dedicate, and even sacrifice for it.

Every disciple is a person of flesh and blood. There are seven emotions and six desires, joys, angers, sorrows, and joys.

They may respect their teachers and uphold their proud traditions.

They may yearn for love and hope to have their own small home in the vast rivers and lakes.

You will witness, participate, or create their stories and lives, and they will be built into a complete river and lake together with the large and small sects in the martial arts.

Quartet Martial Arts

You can freely practice hundreds of martial arts moves with different origins.

Disciples teach, read cheats, or have adventures. The already lost magic book has become a recognized "martial art" in the rivers and lakes.

Then, like a crazy and bold alchemy alchemist, he skillfully matched the martial arts with different characteristics, fully experimented, and shook a thousand catties with four or two when the master made a move, and played more possibilities.

Expansive Map

Eight martial arts, 30 regions, 100 locations. It will become a place for martial arts heroes to swim and a place for the big factions to compete in the rivers and lakes.

A generation of heroes often aims at the world. But there are also high-ranking people, Qi sect hidden faction, who would rather hold the yuan and keep one, and have no quarrel with the world.

The world is vast, whether it is the unification of the four seas or the beauty of a hundred flowers, it is up to you to choose.

Unpredictable Story

Whether it is under the cliff, in a paradise, the white ape teaches art, the master passes on the skills, and those adventures that are talked about.

Or it happened in the martial arts training ground, in the tavern, in the canteen, laughter, those bits and pieces, the stories of life.

Or the martial arts war, the vendetta of the rivers and lakes, the deceit, the usurpation of power, those rivers and lakes, the big scenes and events in the history of martial arts.

will give you a real sense of being in the world of martial arts, a river and lake full of stories, flesh and blood, and choices.

Write Your History

Dominating the world, or practicing the world's magic skills, will not be the only goal to pursue.

Living a peaceful and steady life, operating an acre and three points of land, making friends from all over the world, developing hobbies, collecting apprentices, and having children can also become a life choice in this river and lake.

Live freely, choose freely, a hundred years later, the name and surname of Huanghuang will still be remembered by everyone who has been around, and it is not a kind of fame that will go down in history?

Deep Customization

If you're tired of the established rules and scripts, you can rewrite your martial arts history and customize everything in this world.

Customize your own school, characters, and scripts.

Customize your own stories, events, and rivers and lakes.

short_description: This is a turn-based martial arts school simulation strategy game. You will run a sect and develop characters. Through exploration, expansion, diplomacy, attack and other ways, understand the origin and history of each sect, and influence the development process of the entire martial arts.
